Name: B4Bomber
Description: An OTP and call bomber with advanced protection features for secure testing.

Name: Termux
Description: A powerful terminal emulator that brings Linux environment utilities to Android, perfect for ethical hacking and penetration testing.

Name: Kali NetHunter
Description: The official penetration testing platform for Android by Kali Linux, includes a comprehensive set of hacking tools.

Name: Zanti
Description: A mobile penetration testing toolkit that allows security testers to perform complex audits with ease.

Name: Hackode
Description: A suite of hacking tools for reconnaissance, scanning, and information gathering.

Name: dSploit
Description: A network analysis and penetration suite that offers network mapping, vulnerability scanning, and password cracking.

Name: AndroRAT
Description: An open-source remote access tool that lets you control Android devices remotely.

Name: Nmap for Android
Description: The Android version of the famous network scanner, widely used in penetration testing.

Name: WiFi Kill
Description: Disables internet access for devices connected to the same Wi-Fi network, useful in network control scenarios.

Name: WiFi Analyzer
Description: Provides a detailed analysis of Wi-Fi networks, showing signal strength, channels, and more.

Name: WIBR+

Name: AndroDumpper
Description: Tests the WPS vulnerability of Wi-Fi networks, allowing you to assess network security.

Name: USB Cleaver

Name: Orbot
Description: A proxy app that brings Tor network access to Android.

Name: DroidSheep
